title: build_agents_and_teams_with_dependency_resolution
description: Test the /build endpoint to ensure agents and teams are built correctly with proper dependency resolution.

title: validate_schemas_tasks_and_configurations
description: Test the /validate endpoint to verify that schemas, tasks, and configurations are validated accurately.

title: list_available_agents_and_capabilities
description: Test the /list_agents endpoint to confirm it lists all available agents along with their capabilities.

title: load_agent_configurations_from_markdown_files
description: Test the /agents/load endpoint to ensure agent configurations are loaded correctly from markdown files.

title: validate_agent_dependencies_and_configurations
description: Test the /agents/validate endpoint to verify validation of agent dependencies and configurations.

title: build_agent_teams_with_bundled_dependencies
description: Test the /teams/build endpoint to ensure agent teams are built with all necessary bundled dependencies.

title: execute_structured_tasks_with_schema_validation
description: Test the /tasks/execute endpoint to confirm execution of structured tasks with proper schema validation.

title: dynamic_task_planning_and_decomposition
description: Test the /tasks/plan endpoint to verify dynamic planning and decomposition of complex tasks.

title: validate_json_schemas_for_tasks_and_checklists
description: Test the /validate/schemas endpoint to ensure JSON schemas for tasks and checklists are validated correctly.

title: manage_working_memory_for_active_tasks
description: Test the /memory/working endpoint to verify management of working memory during active tasks.
